item.title: Welcome to akenji's lab!
item.description:
My name is Kenji Arai, a systems engineer. My interests are in HPC and astronomy among computer related topics. Recently, though, my field of interest is shifting to AI /DeepLearning rather than HPC.

Hope you find some articles of interest…
